titleproper.value:
Guide to the Abu Dhabi Film Festival Collection
                    <lb/>2007-2014
                    <lb/>
                    <num>AD MC 006</num>

author.value: Finding aid prepared by Samuel Ball

creation.value:
This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit
                <date>2016-05-02T09:30+0400</date>

abstract.label: Abstract
abstract.value: The Abu Dhabi Film Festival Collection includes DVD copies of many films screened over the course of the festival's 2007-2014 run and ephemera related to the festival. The films represent the different sections of each festival as well as the work of local and international filmmakers.

p.value: The collection is open to researchers. For more information contact nyuad-asc-group@nyu.edu.

Published Citations for archives should take the following form: Identification of item, date; Abu Dhabi Film Festival Collection; ADMC 006; box number; folder number; NYUAD Archives and Special Collections; New York University Abu Dhabi Libraries.

The collection contains DVD copies of films screened at the Abu Dhabi Film Festival from its first festival in 2007 to the final one in 2014. The films represented in the collection come from the different competitions, showcases, and presentations from each of the versions of the festival; the national, regional, and international films are both documentary and fiction (narrative) in both short and feature length. The collection is made up of works that were made for submission to the festival, or were screened at many film festivals that year, as well as older films that were presented as part of showcases and retrospectives. Along with the films, the collection contains ephemera and publications (guides, brochures) from the festival.
